title: Drawing, "Sketches.  Distant view of St. Peters in Rome, Italy.", January 1869
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite with figures and the following at various locations:  purple / rich orange red edge / smoky gre... / greyer rosy Dark / grey warmer; and at lower right:  2 rosy glow / 3 ore smoky yet rosy / 4 Delicate grey blue still roseate.
Verso: Inscribed in graphite:  gold glow / delicious frosted silvery grey.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view containing a distant view of the dome of St. Peter's against a sky with some clouds.

Verso:  Horizontal distant view of the dome of St. Peter's seen from the Northwest.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches.  Distant view of St. Peters in Rome, Italy.", January 1869.
January 1869. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-153.
